snippet: N. Joseph Woodland helped conceive of technology that helped revolutionize the retail industry and today graces nearly every surface of contemporary life: the bar code. He was 91.
abstract: N. Joseph Woodland helped conceive of technology that helped revolutionize the retail industry and today graces nearly every surface of contemporary life: the bar code. He was 91.

headline.main: The Inventor of the Bar Code Dies
